description: Advanced color visualization for PAWN/SA-MP/open.mp development
command.ignoreFile: Ignore All Colors In This File
command.unignoreFile: Restore All Colors In This File
command.resetGuideState: Reset Guide State (Show Guide on Next Restart)
menu.ignoreAllColorsInFile: Ignore All Colors In This File
menu.restoreAllColorsInFile: Restore All Colors In This File
config.title: PAWN Painter
config.autoPerformanceMode.description: Automatically suggest chunking optimization when files have many colors that may hit VS Code's decorator limit
config.language.description: Language for PAWN Painter interface. 'auto' uses VS Code's language setting, or select a specific language to override.
config.general.enableColorPicker.descrip: Enable the VS Code colour picker for all supported colour formats
config.performance.colorDecoratorLimit.d: Maximum number of color decorators VS Code will show. Automatically updates VS Code's editor.colorDecoratorsLimit setting. Higher values may impact performance. VS Code restart may be required for full effect.
config.gameText.textEnabled.description: GameText: Enable highlighting for text following GameText colour codes (~r~, ~g~, etc)
config.gameText.textStyle.description: GameText: Choose how text following GameText colours should be displayed
config.inlineText.textEnabled.descriptio: Inline Text: Enable highlighting for text following inline colour codes ({RRGGBB})
config.inlineText.textStyle.description: Inline Text: Choose how text following inline colour codes should be displayed
config.hexParameter.textEnabled.descript: Hex Parameters: Enable coloring for string literals following hex color parameters in function calls
config.hexParameter.textStyle.descriptio: Hex Parameters: Choose how text following hex color parameters should be displayed
config.hex.showAlphaWarnings.description: Alpha Warnings: Show warnings for colours with alpha value of 00
config.alphaWarnings.highlightCode.descr: Alpha Warnings: Highlight the colour code itself
config.alphaWarnings.highlightStyle.desc: Alpha Warnings: Choose how the colour code should be highlighted
